attributes.action: amend the law on speeding convictions and fines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On a first conviction the penalty is £60.00 and 3 points.They are there for three years,and you must wait a futher year before the points can be removed.
This is disproportionate.
For a first offence it should be one or the other.
